---
title: "Abodauern"
---
Should be rendered at https://tensorchiefs.github.io/data/data/challenger.html

## Description

This data set contains the time (in month) a swiss newpaper has been subscribed to by a customer. 

## Plotting in R

```{r plot_data, echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
data <- edudat::load_data("abodauer.csv")
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data, aes(x = x)) +
  geom_histogram() + 
  xlab("Dauer (Monaten)") 
```
